name: Tour To The Sacred Valley Of Cusco
description: Discover with us the beauty of the Sacred Valley of the Incas, a wonderful Andean Paradise, where you will be able to explore the Inca ruins of Pisac, amazing constructions built during the heydays of the Inca Culture. Explore at your own pace the Market of Pisac, a picturesque Andean shopping center where native people are seen bartering their products and also selling a wide variety of handicrafts. Here, modernity and tradition are in equilibrium, with locals respectfully preserving their past, following indigenous practices and observing centuries old festivals. Finally visit the Ruins of Ollantaytambo, Once a country retreat for Inca royalty and nobility, a majestic Inca building where the Incas also fought some of their last battles, resisting Spanish conquest.
